name: Transform Race: Impossible Stu
description:
Transform Race: Impossible Stunt Car is the greatest convincing racing and simulator adventure where you have to hike on the mountains with super monster truck stunts free. mini art presents the idea of transform race, car, jeep, motorcycle and airplane flying pilot on the impossible tracks of sky
Features:,
Use common sense to complete the level
Multiple vehicles like car, airplane jet, bike, boat and monster truck
Realistic car racing and jet-ski with monster truck riding animations
